## Las Informaciones con Leyni - News Website Project

This is a professional Next.js news website with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase integration.

### Project Requirements
- Professional news website inspired by noticiassin.com
- Color scheme: white background, black and blue accents
- Admin dashboard for content management
- Supabase backend for news storage
- Image upload and management
- Responsive design
- TypeScript for type safety

### Project Structure
- Frontend: Next.js with TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Supabase
- Authentication: Supabase Auth
- File Storage: Supabase Storage

### Completed Steps
- [x] Created project workspace structure
